name: dimity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
light, strong, cotton cloth, often with a pattern of stripes : Her outfit was completed with a neat, white, dimity apron. There were blue dimity curtains over the two windows.
More examplesFewer examplesOne of the dolls had a kind of white nightcap, in white dimity edged with lace. In the room were two little beds, covered with white dimity.She went quickly across the room and pushed aside the blue dimity curtains.She wore an old cotton gown of striped dimity.
